extDescription.message: Search with multiple search engines simultaneously

usageStep1.message: Type $KEY$ in the address bar and press space

usageStep4.message: Results will open in new tabs for all configured search engines

configStep1.message: Select preset search engine to auto-fill URL

configStep2.message: Choose "Custom" to add other search engines

configStep3.message: Use %s in URL to represent search query

configStep4.message: Timeout (ms): Set maximum page load waiting time

configStep4Sub2.message: Tabs will auto-close if loading exceeds timeout
